transcript:

Executive: Ha sir, hello kekkuringala? Sir kekkuringala? Kekuthu sir kekuthu sir. Okay okay okay. Ipo unga screen mattum share pannunga sir.

Executive: Actually theriyuthunga sir theriyuthu. Konjam zoom in pannungalen.
Customer: Okayngala? So suthama unga screen eh enakku vanthu oru maari blank ah theriyara maari irukku.
Executive: Ithu mattum thaan sir. Ippa naan ithu paarunga view details kodukkaren. Ithu by leads kodutha udane intha maari vanthuthu enakku.
Customer: Contact by leads irukulla. Close pannittu thirumbi first la irunthu open pannunga.
Executive: Reload pannaren. Okayngala?
Customer: Reload pannittu ippo for example, intha white urul dal irukkingala?
Customer: Aah, Viruthunagar la irunthu by leads kodutha udane intha maari vanthuthu.
Executive: Sir, ithu paathinga appdina ithu IndiaMART oda problem kidaiyaathu.
Customer: Aah.
Executive: Ithu IndiaMART problem kidaiyaathu. Maybe unga system oda problem ah irukkum ithu.
Customer: Appdingala?
Executive: Aama aama system oda issue va thaan irukkum.
Customer: Seringa sir.
Executive: Ithu lead manager open pannunga.
Customer: Athu open pannunga. Sub open pannunga.
Customer: Ithu work out aaguthu bro. Aah, vanthuthu bro. Aah, ithu work out aaguthu paarunga. Ippo neenga confirm pannathu inga kaattuthu paarunga.
Executive: Aama inga kaattuthu. Athu maybe paathinga appdina athu ungaloda system oda problem ah thaan sir irukkum.
Customer: Seri right okaynga okaynga. Maybe maybe athu ungaloda network issue va kooda irukkum.
Executive: Okay paathinga nalla clear ah irukku. Seri right okay naan naan paathukaren. Okay orae nimisham antha dashboard ku vaangalen. Mela aah sollunga. Keela scroll pannunga keela scroll pannunga.
Executive: So inga irukuthu paathingala? Intha ithu vanthu ennoda details mattum thaan intha idathula irukuthu ungalukku. Seringala? Neenga vanthu phone number kidaiyaathu. Neenga ethuvaa irunthinaalum neenga enakku thaan neenga call pannano. Ennoda number ippo ungalukku naan link anupirunthaen paarunga. Neenga antha number ku call panni sir namma video meeting connect pannikkalaam appdinnu sonninga appdina naan immediately ungalukku naan connect panniduven.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Seringala? Ethukku ithu neenga inga click panninga appdina enna aagumnna direct ah ithukku poirum Noida ku poirum. Seringala? Anga poittinga appdinaalum anga Hindi persons thaan iruppaanga. Namakku Tamil support appdinnathu kidaikkaathu.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay.
Executive: So avanga udane enakku thaan call forward panniduvaanga Tamil person appdinnathunaala.
Customer: Aah ha ha.
Executive: So athukku neenga direct ah ennaiyave neenga reach panniralaam appdinnu thaan naan solla varen. Neenga ithukku appuram paathinga appdina neenga thodaatheenga. Video meeting venum appdina ennoda number ku neenga call pannunga naan ungalukku guide pannaren.
Customer: Seringa seringa.
Executive: Okay okay. Ippo eppadikku sir naan intha by leads ku mattum thaan ungalukku konjam problem ah irukuthu appdinnu solla vareenga?
Customer: Aama aama athu mattum thaan vera ethum illenga sir.
Executive: Okay. Ippo ithukku vaanga product page ku vaanga naan annikke ungalukku sollirunthaen products la konjam images add pannano appdinnathu maari neenga pannaren appdinnathu maari sonninga.
Customer: Enna sir products la description add pannirukken sir.
Executive: Description add pannirukkinga konjam scroll pannitte vaanga rendu naan neethiye munna naal paathaen oru rendu image product ku vanthu images kammiya iruntha maari irunthuchu. Neethiye munna naal paatha apparam solren.
Customer: Scroll pannitte vaanga.
Executive: Ellaathukkume rendu image irukke.
Customer: Moonu image ellaathukkum vachirukkinga. Okay okay.
Executive: Bro inga paarunga rendu image thaan irukku paarunga mela mela.
Customer: Aama ithukku rendu image thaan irukku. Mela mela mela sir mela sir. Ithuvaa intha aval rendu image thaan irukuthu paarunga. Moonu image irukkanum athukku.
Executive: Ippo inga ellaam moonu image irukuthu paarunga naan kaattala. Moonu image irukuthu paarunga.
Customer: Aama aama aama aama. So athu aana antha athaan naan neethu naan paathaen rendu image thaan irunthuchu oru rendu product ku athunaalathaan naan ippo ungalukku product ku vaanga udane image vachirunthinga athai konjam add pannunga sir ippo naan contact ku kooda add panniralaam image vachirukkingala?
Executive: Illenga sir athai edukkanum eduthu athai anuppanum.
Customer: Ithu onnukku thaana naan anuppiren sir.
Executive: Okay ennaa oru oru ethukkume score vanthu inga 85 appdinnathu maari irukkanum sir. Inga side la score kaattuthu paarunga 85 appdinnu. Aama 75 thaan irukku. 75 thaan irukku antha oru image add panninga appdina athu 85 aa maaridum.
Customer: Okay okay okay sir.
Executive: Okayngala? Okay ippo nalla innum scroll pannitte vaanga.
Customer: Avvalothaan sir. Avvalothaan avvalothaan. Ungalukku vera intha by leads thavira vera ethum doubt irukuthungala?
Executive: Vera ethum illenga sir.
Customer: Doubt ethum illa.
Executive: Okay lead manager naan proper ah use panna theriyungala use panreengala athai?
Customer: Pannittu thaan irukkaen actually lead eduthu thaan irukken. Message ku reply pannittu thaan irukkom. Ithu vanthu vanthu irukkom.
Executive: Inga ask for review ntrathai neenga ellaa neenga edukara ellaa ethukkume kodunga.
Customer: Ethukku sir?
Executive: Neenga catalog link pakkathula ask for review ntrathu irukuthu paarunga.
Customer: Aah ha ha.
Executive: Athai kodunga ethukkaaga naan athai kodukka solrenna so ithu neenga suppose neenga anuppiruntha quotation price ithula ungalukku okay vaa irunthuchu appdina ungalukku good review kooda koduppaanga.
Customer: Aah ha ha.
Executive: So athai base panni vanthu ungalukku promotion wise ungalukku konjam increase aagum athukkaaga thaan solla vanthen.
Customer: Seringa sir naan kodukkaren.
Executive: Okay appuram namba vera oru rendu moonu ithai naan check panni paathaen ungalukku rendu moonu ithula konjam enquiries miss aagura maari irunthuchu inga.
Customer: Ennathu sir miss aagurathunna paesalaingala?
Executive: Neenga paesatha maari all contact click pannunga.
Customer: Ethu sir? Ask for review kodunga ask for mela all contact ntrathu irukku paarunga athai click pannunga.
Executive: All contact sir. Aama antha recent calls appdintrathai click pannunga. Athai thaan click pannunga. Scroll pannitte vaanga. Scroll pannitte vaanga.
Executive: So ithu ennathunna intha inga paarunga red color la irukuthu paarunga. Aama. So ithu paathinga appdina miss call. Okay. Direct ah ungalukku call pannirukkaanga but aana namba miss pannirukkom. Aama sir naan phone naan handle pannarenna okay athukilla madam thaan handle pannanga illa madam sir handle pannuraanga. So ungalukku naan solren naan. Seri okay actually ippo neenga concern potturunthathukku apprama naan vanthu ungalukku call panrathukku mela naan udane seri maam thaan ethum ketturukkaanga pola appdinnu sollittu maam ku call pannittaen. Maam edukala. Seringa seringa sir. Okay ithukku appuram paathinga appdina neenga enakku call pannunga seringala? Ithukku appuram enakku call pannunga seringala? Seri seri. Okay okay. Sir ippo intha actually ippo neenga pannirunthathu oru concern maari create aayirukuthu ippo naan ungalukku intha concern close pannikkalaangala ungalukku sort out aakiduthu la? Sort out aayiruchu sir. Okay okay naan antha concern close pannaren close pannathukku apprama paathinga appdina ungalukku oru mail varum athaavathu ippo enggitta pesinathu ungalukku satisfied aa or not satisfied aa appdinnu kettu oru mail varum. Seringala? Athukku neenga ungalukku enna neenga satisfied appdinnu neenga satisfied nu koduthurunga antha idathula seringala? Enna mail idikku varum intha mail idiya? Ippo neenga thaana concern create pannirunthinga? Intha mail idikku varum. Appo ungalukku thaan aama aama athukku thaan varum. Seri naan koduthukkaren sir naan close pannittu ungalukku naan thiruppi oru call back pannaren neenga athai konjam paarunga seringala? Seringa sir okay. Illa naan close pannala pannittu naan ungalukku call back pannaren. Seringa sir okay. Okay okay sir thank you sir. Thank you thank you sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with buyleads on the system.

- Images missing in product page.

- Enquiries missing.



Resolution:

- Suggested troubleshooting steps for buyleads issue.

- Advised to add missing images to product page.

- Explained how to check for missed calls.

- Explained the importance of 'Ask for Review'.

- Concern will be closed and customer will receive feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after closing the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product images, lead manager, ask for review
